Text:
WarGames has horrible video quality, with fine detail completely gone. The non-anamorphic DVD is better.

Don't waste your time.

User Type: r frame rate and file size (which should be around 2GB)
Username: since you'll wind up with choppy video if you set the proper frame rate.  Such as shame all these HDTV rips were done incorrectly
Date: and all are at least twice the size they should be."
